sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Title from '../common/title/Title' import {homeAbout} from '../../dummydata' const AboutCard = () => { return ( <>
{/**/}
<div className='items'> {homeAbout.map((val)=>( <div className='items flexSB'> <div className='img'> <img src={val.cover} alt=''/> </div> <div className='text'> <h2>{val.title}</h2> <p>{val.desc}</p> </div> </div> ))} </div> </div> </div> </section> </> ) } export default AboutCard
